text: Surround sound is a type of multichannel audio. Surround may refer to: *Surround channels, audio channels in surround sound *Surround Video, Microsoft program for creating 3D images *Surround session, online advertising technique in which one advertiser dominates a website *Surround (album), an album by Jon Bauer *Surround (video game), an Atari 2600 video game cartridge *Surround (horse), Australian racehorse
title: Surround (disambiguation)
